module.name: external_class
module.purpose: The External_class application module supports the requirement to identify classes that are defined external to a data exchange file in a Reference Data Library.

inscope.li: The identification of a class that is external to a data exchange file;
The identification of a reference data library, external to a data exchange file, that holds the definition for classes;
A reference to a class in a reference data library.

outscope.li: The definition of a reference data library.
